round_best: Develop a large-scale generative model that automatically synthesizes realistic and complex datasets containing higher-order interactions by mimicking the underlying structures of naturally occurring complex systems, such as biological ecosystems or social networks. This model could use variations of Generative Adversarial Networks (GANs) tailored to produce simplicial complexes and hypergraphs, adjusted through feedback from domain experts in biology, sociology, and physics to ensure the generated datasets are both challenging and representative. The generated datasets can then be used as benchmarks to evaluate and refine models in topological deep learning, fostering progress by providing a diverse array of test cases simulating real-world complexity.
